pages.title: Enchanting automata core
pages.text: After consuming librarian soul, automata core become much more like enchanting table. But like every strict machine, this table likes strict linear progression.

pages.description: Trying to enchant item in selected slot. But instead of standard minecraft level cost, every level will have same cost that can be retrieved via $(configuration)

parameters: used level count, should be positive integer, less then or equal to default minecraft enchanting level limit
returns: True if operation successful, nil otherwise

pages.description: Tried to extract enchantments from selected slot to book

parameters: slot with book, that will be enchanted. Should be from 1 to 16
returns: True if operation successful, nil otherwise
